_header: What needs a pilgrim do that will speed him smart
_description: Advice to pilgrims — three monorhyming lines in a Latin sermon

OxfBal149.Transcription:
What nedys a pilgryme do þat wyll sped hym
                    smertAmbulareWhat nedes a man that wilt plese wyþe hertWell
                    fioWhat nedes a rewm do that wylt stand in querthabere dileccionem
                    & diligere
